approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

DELEGATION_TYPEHASH.description: Returns the delegation type hash for off-chain signatures.

DOMAIN_TYPEHASH.description: Returns the domain type hash for off-chain signatures.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of an owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified address.

checkpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints and votes at a specific block number.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

delegate.description: Delegates voting power to another address.

delegateBySig.description: Delegates voting power using a signature.

delegates.description: Returns the delegate of a specified address.

getCurrentVotes.description: Returns the current votes of a specified address.

getPriorVotes.description: Returns the prior votes of a specified address at a specific block number.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nonces.description: Returns the current nonce for a specified address, used in signatures.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for a specified address.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.
